attributes.action: Allowing Gay and Lesbians the opportunity to give blood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the National Blood Service to allow Gay men and women the opportunity to give blood and to withdraw there comments regarding Gay men and women being in the same category of risk as a Prostitute or Drug Addicts in all there literature.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
